objectives.name: Corner the Market
objectives.condition: Control 4 planets that each have the same planet trait

objectives.name: Develop Weaponry
objectives.condition: Own 2 unit upgrade technologies

objectives.name: Diversify Research
objectives.condition: Own 2 technologies in each of 2 colors

objectives.name: Erect a Monument
objectives.condition: Spend 8 resources

objectives.name: Expand Borders
objectives.condition: Control 6 planets in non-home systems

objectives.name: Found Research Outposts
objectives.condition: Control 3 planets that have technology specialties

objectives.name: Intimidate Council
objectives.condition: Have 1 or more ships in 2 systems that are adjacent to Mecatol Rex's System

objectives.name: Lead From the Front
objectives.condition: Spend a total of 3 tokens from your tactic and/or strategy pools

objectives.name: Negotiate Trade Routes
objectives.condition: Spend 5 trade goods

objectives.name: Sway the Council
objectives.condition: Spend 8 influence

objectives.name: Centralize Galactic Trade
objectives.condition: Spend 10 trade goods

objectives.name: Conquer the Weak
objectives.condition: Control 1 planet that is in another player's home system

objectives.name: Form Galactic Brain Trust
objectives.condition: Control 5 planets that have technology specialties

objectives.name: Found a Golden Age
objectives.condition: Spend 16 resources

objectives.name: Galvanize the People
objectives.condition: Spend a total of 6 tokens from your tactic and/or strategy pools

objectives.name: Manipulate Galactic Law
objectives.condition: Spend 16 influence

objectives.name: Master the Sciences
objectives.condition: Own 2 technologies in each of 4 colors

objectives.name: Revolutionize Warfare
objectives.condition: Own 3 unit upgrade technologies

objectives.name: Subdue the Galaxy
objectives.condition: Control 11 planets in non-home systems

objectives.name: Unify the Colonies
objectives.condition: Control 6 planets that each have the same planet trait

objectives.name: Destroy Their Greatest Ship
objectives.condition: Destroy another player's war sun or flagship

objectives.name: Make an Example of Their World
objectives.condition: Use BOMBARDMENT to destroy the last of a player's ground forces on a planet

objectives.name: Spark a Rebellion
objectives.condition: Win a combat against a player who has the most victory points

objectives.name: Turn Their Fleets to Dust
objectives.condition: Use SPACE CANNON to destroy the last of a player's ships in a system

objectives.name: Unveil Flagship
objectives.condition: Win a space combat in a system that contains your flagship. You cannot score this objective if your flagship is destroyed in the combat

objectives.name: Adapt New Strategies
objectives.condition: Own 2 faction technologies. (Valefar Assimilator technologies do not count toward this objective)

objectives.name: Become the Gatekeeper
objectives.condition: Have 1 or more ships in a system that contains an alpha wormhole and 1 or more ships in a system that contains a beta wormhole

objectives.name: Control the Region
objectives.condition: Have 1 or more ships in 6 systems

objectives.name: Cut Supply Lines
objectives.condition: Have 1 or more ships in the same system as another player's space dock

objectives.name: Establish a Perimeter
objectives.condition: Have 4 PDS units on the game board

objectives.name: Forge an Alliance
objectives.condition: Control 4 cultural planets

objectives.name: Form a Spy Network
objectives.condition: Discard 5 action Cards

objectives.name: Fuel the War Machine
objectives.condition: Have 3 space docks on the game board

objectives.name: Gather a Mighty Fleet
objectives.condition: Have 5 dreadnoughts on the game board

objectives.name: Learn the Secrets of the Cosmos
objectives.condition: Have 1 or more ships in 3 systems that are each adjacent to an anomaly

objectives.name: Master the Laws of Physics
objectives.condition: Own 4 technologies of the same color

objectives.name: Mine Rare Metals
objectives.condition: Control 4 hazardous planets

objectives.name: Monopolize Production
objectives.condition: Control 4 industrial planets

objectives.name: Occupy the Seat of the Empire
objectives.condition: Control Mecatol Rex and have 3 or more ships in its system

objectives.name: Threaten Enemies
objectives.condition: Have 1 or more ships in a system that is adjacent to another player's home system
